name: Crash On Planet Lumo
description:
Build and fight off aliens in this top-down shoot-em-up, base builder. Fix the ship and fight off the alien bots.

Controls

E - to interact with the control panels as well as selecting menu items
Arrow Keys - for movement and selecting items in menus
W - dash
Q - shoot but you need arllixium to shoot.
1 - to change weapon (Who knows why I would add a second weapon :/)

Game Play

Head Over to the pre-built drill and start making resources, build a converter on one of the plots and convert the resources from the drill to arllixium. Fix the ship. Make Sure you have enough arllixium to fight with.
